sentences.sentence: This helpsme check my work for halos and mistakes.
sentences.translation: 这帮助我检查操作中的色圈和错误。

sentences.sentence: We won't lie around on clouds with halos playing harps!
sentences.translation: 我们不会躺在云端，头顶着光圈弹竖琴！

sentences.sentence: So physicists proposed that the galaxies are surrounded by halos of invisible matter.
sentences.translation: 所以物理学家提出星系被不可见物质的晕圈所包围。
